title: Finalize STYO Tech Neon logo assets (optimized SVGs + icons) and fix frontend loading paths

requirements.text: Generate and add the finalized official “STYO Tech Neon” logo asset set as background-free, optimized vector assets: full logo (icon + STYO text) and icon-only versions, with a subtle/sharp glow (reduced blur) and correct proportions/aspect ratio, ensuring the SVGs contain no rasterized glow effects and scale cleanly on mobile and desktop.

quotes:
Please finalize this as the official STYO Tech Neon logo.
Now do the following:
Extract the logo cleanly (without background).
Export as proper optimized SVG (no raster glow effects).
Maintain correct proportions and aspect ratio.
Reduce excessive blur — keep glow subtle and sharp.
Ensure it scales perfectly on mobile and desktop.

acceptanceCriteria: All requested logo variants are present as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (see imageRequirements filenames).
SVGs render crisply at small sizes (e.g., 32px–64px icon usage) and at large sizes (e.g., header logo) without distortion or pixelation.
SVG markup uses vector shapes/gradients/filters only (no embedded raster images/data URIs for glow).
Glow is visibly more subtle and sharper than the prior version (reduced blur radius / less spread), while keeping a tech-neon look.
Full logo and icon-only preserve consistent proportions across exported formats (SVG/PNG).

requirements.text: Export and include the required raster deliverables for the finalized logo set: a 512x512 PNG app icon, a 32x32 favicon, and a white monochrome version (full logo and icon-only) as SVG (and include corresponding PNGs where specified by imageRequirements).

quotes:
Deliver:
Full logo (icon + STYO text) SVG
Icon-only SVG (for favicon & app icon)
512x512 PNG (app icon)
32x32 favicon
White monochrome version

acceptanceCriteria: 512x512 PNG exists at the specified filename and has transparent background.
32x32 favicon exists at the specified filename and is crisp/legible at 32x32.
White monochrome full logo and icon-only SVGs exist and render as solid white on transparent background.
All exported PNGs are optimized (reasonable file size for web use) and have correct dimensions.

requirements.text: Ensure the frontend loads the logo and favicon from the correct existing public asset paths by verifying/updating references in the Header, Footer, and index.html to point to the final generated filenames, and ensure no broken asset paths remain.

quotes: Also confirm the exact asset path where the logo is stored and being loaded from.

Make sure:
The correct SVG files are placed in the public/assets directory.
The file paths in the header point to the exact existing location.
The full logo renders properly on desktop and mobile.
The icon-only version is correctly set as favicon.
No broken asset paths remain after rebuild.
After rebuilding, please confirm the exact file path being used for the logo.

acceptanceCriteria: Header logo loads successfully from /assets/generated/styo-logo-tech-neon-full.dim_1200x400.svg (no 404 in browser network panel).
index.html favicon link points to a real file path under /assets/generated/ and loads successfully (no 404).
OpenGraph/Twitter image references remain valid and point to an existing PNG under /assets/generated/ (no 404).
No other references to non-existent legacy logo paths remain in the frontend.

requirements.text: Confirm in a developer-facing note (e.g., a short comment near the Header logo usage) the exact asset paths currently used by the app for: (1) header/footer full logo, and (2) favicon, matching the files shipped in frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: Also confirm the exact asset path where the logo is stored and being loaded from.

acceptanceCriteria: Header source path is explicitly documented in code near the Header logo usage.
Favicon source path is explicitly documented in code near the favicon declaration in frontend/index.html (comment) or in an adjacent documented location.
Documented paths match the actual filenames present in frontend/public/assets/generated and load in the running app.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all backend logic unchanged; this request is branding/asset and frontend-loading only.
nonGoals: Redesigning the site layout or changing navigation/content beyond what is required to correctly load and display the logo assets.
Adding new authentication providers or any non-Internet-Identity auth changes.
Introducing any external image hosting/CDN; assets must be served from the app’s public directory.

required: Tech neon full logo (icon + STYO text), transparent background, subtle sharp glow, optimized vector (styo-logo-tech-neon-full.dim_1200x400.svg)
Tech neon icon-only mark, transparent background, subtle sharp glow, optimized vector (styo-logo-tech-neon-icon.dim_512x512.svg)
Tech neon icon-only mark, transparent background (styo-logo-tech-neon-icon.dim_512x512.png)
Tech neon icon-only mark, transparent background, 512x512 (styo-logo-tech-neon-appicon.dim_512x512.png)
White monochrome full logo (icon + STYO text), transparent background, optimized vector (styo-logo-white-full.dim_1200x400.svg)
White monochrome icon-only mark, transparent background, optimized vector (styo-logo-white-icon.dim_512x512.svg)
